cards.name: Doctor Strange
cards.ability: On Reveal: Move your highest-Power card(s) to this location.

cards.name: Ghost
cards.ability: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all End of Turn cards here.

cards.name: Havok
cards.ability: End of Turn: You lose 1 Max Energy and this gains +3 Power.

cards.name: Human Torch
cards.ability: When this moves, double its Power.

cards.name: Surge
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck -1 Cost and +1 Power. After you play it, repeat this ability.

cards.name: Topaz
cards.ability: After you play a card here, move it to the middle location.

cards.name: Vulture
cards.ability: When this card moves, +3 Power.

cards.name: White Tiger
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add an 9-Power <mark>Tiger</mark> to another location.

cards.name: Mister Fantastic: First Steps
cards.ability: End of Turn: Give a card in your hand -1 Cost or +2 Power.

cards.name: Terrax the Tamer
cards.ability: On Reveal: For each location, shuffle a <mark>Rock</mark> into the losing player's deck.

cards.name: Viv Vision
cards.ability: At the start of each turn, give all cards in your hand +1 Power if you’re winning here. Otherwise, move this to another location.

cards.name: Sparky
cards.ability: Activate: Give your card that last moved +3 Power and move it back to its previous location.

cards.name: Jocasta
cards.ability: Activate: Immediately Activate your other cards here. (without using up their Activate abilities)

cards.name: Warlock
cards.ability: Activate: For each unspent Energy, give a card in your hand -1 Cost.

cards.name: Jim Hammond Human Torch
cards.ability: At the start of each turn, +1 Power for each bonus Energy you have.

cards.name: Bastion
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add copies of your other cards here to your hand. Set their Costs to 2 and Power to 3.

cards.name: Headpool
cards.ability: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand, then give all cards in your hand +1 Power.

cards.name: Colonel America
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your other cards here have +1 Power for each turn you've discarded a card.

cards.name: The Hunger
cards.ability: On Reveal: Horde +3.

cards.name: Zombie Captain Marvel
cards.ability: Activate: Destroy your other cards here to get +3 Power for each. Move to a location you're losing.

cards.name: Zombie Galacti
cards.ability: Start of Game: Choose 6 other cards in your deck. On Reveal: Transform those cards into copies of this.

cards.name: Zombie Giant-Man
cards.ability: On Reveal: Horde +1, then this gains Power equal to your Zombie Horde.

cards.name: Zombie Mister Fantastic
cards.ability: On Reveal: Horde +2. Activate: Give 4 of your created cards +1 Power.

cards.name: Zombie Power Man
cards.ability: End of Turn: If you're winning here, discard the leftmost card from your hand.

cards.name: Zombie Scarlet Witch
cards.ability: After you play a card here, Horde +2.

cards.name: Zombie Sentry
cards.ability: On Reveal: Horde +1 for each of your cards at the right location.

cards.name: America Chavez
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck +3 Power.

cards.name: Cannonball
cards.ability: On Reveal: Move the highest-Power enemy card here away. If you can't, destroy it with a <mark>Rock</mark>.

cards.name: Fenris Wolf
cards.ability: Activate: Rusurrect your opponent's highest-Power discarded or destroyed card on your side of this location.

cards.name: Ghost-Spider
cards.ability: On Reveal: The last card you played moves here.

cards.name: Juggernaut
cards.ability: On Reveal: Move away all enemy cards played here this turn. (including unrevealed cards)

cards.name: Nightmare
cards.ability: On Reveal: Replace the text of each card in your hand with text from a random card of the same Cost.

cards.name: Fantasticar
cards.ability: Activate: Give your End of Turn cards +2 Power.

cards.name: Mad Thinker
cards.ability: At the start of each turn (after drawing), +2 Power if your hand is full.

cards.name: Silver Surfer: First Steps
cards.ability: End of Turn: If you're winning this location with an On Reveal card, copy its text.

items.title: Golden Gauntlet World Championship Series
items: A celebration of player-powered competition—open to all, free to enter, and full of SNAP energy. Visit Discord for more info.

items.title: High Voltage
items: 1,500 Volts - 2x Purple Cosmic Border
7,000 Volts - 2x Premium Mystery Border
18,000 Volts - Premium Mystery Variant

items.name: Mister Fantastic: First Steps
changes: 2/2 – End of Turn: Give a card in your hand -1 Cost or +2 Power.

items.name: Surge
changes: 2/2 – On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck -1 Cost and +1 Power. After you play it, repeat this ability.

items.name: Havok
changes: 2/0 – End of Turn: You lose 1 Max Energy and this gains +4 Power.
2/1 – End of Turn: You lose 1 Max Energy and this gains +3 Power.

items.name: Ghost
changes: 3/5 – Ongoing: Your cards are always revealed last. (Their On Reveal abilities happen last.).
3/4 – On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all End of Turn cards here.

items.name: Vulture
changes: 3/3 – When this card moves, +6 Power.
1/2 – When this card moves, +3 Power.

items.name: Human Torch
changes: 1/2 – When this moves, double its Power.

items.name: Topaz
changes: 3/4 – After you play a card here, move it to the middle location.

items.name: Doctor Strange
changes: 2/3 – On Reveal: Move your highest-Power card(s) to this location.

items.name: White Tiger
changes: 5/1 – On Reveal: Add an 8-Power Tiger to another location.
8-Power Tiger -> 9-Power Tiger

items.name: Terrax the Tamer
changes: 3/3 – On Reveal: For each location, shuffle a Rock into the losing player’s deck.

items.name: Fenris Wolf
changes: 2/3 – Activate: Resurrect your opponent’s highest-Power discarded or destroyed card on your side of this location.

items.name: Cannonball
changes: 5/8 – On Reveal: Move the highest-Power enemy card here away. If you can’t, destroy it with a Rock.

items.name: Juggernaut
changes: 3/3 – On Reveal: Move away all enemy cards played here this turn. (including unrevealed cards)

items.name: Fantasticar
changes: 4/7 – Activate: Give your End of Turn cards +2 Power.

items.name: Mad Thinker
changes: 1/1 – At the start of each turn (after drawing), +2 Power if your hand is full.

items.name: Nightmare
changes: 3/-1- On Reveal: Replace the text of each card in your hand with text from a random card of the same Cost.

items.name: Silver Surfer: First Steps
changes: 3/4 – End of Turn: If you’re winning this location with an On Reveal card, copy its text.

items.name: America Chavez
changes: 1/2 – On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck +2 Power.
1/2 – On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck +3 Power.

items.name: Ghost-Spider
changes: 1/2 – On Reveal: The last card you played moves here.
